description: Babur defeats Ibrahim Lodi at the First Battle of Panipat, founding the Mughal Empire in India.
Sher Shah Suri defeats Humayun at the Battle of Kannauj.
Second Battle of Panipat fought between Akbar and Hemu.
Establishment of the British East India Company.
Sir Thomas Roe arrives at Jahangir's court.
Aurangzeb becomes Mughal Emperor after defeating Dara Shikoh.
Treaty of Purandar signed between Shivaji and Jai Singh.
Death of Aurangzeb; decline of the Mughal Empire begins.
Battle of Plassey fought; British East India Company gains control of Bengal.
Third Battle of Panipat fought between Marathas and Ahmad Shah Abdali.
Vellore Mutiny against the British, one of the earliest revolts by Indian soldiers.
Abolition of Sati by Governor-General Lord William Bentinck.
English Education Act introduced by Lord Macaulay.
Treaty of Lahore signed after the First Anglo-Sikh War.
First railway in India inaugurated from Bombay to Thane.
Revolt of 1857 begins at Meerut; spread across North India.
Queen Victoria’s Proclamation; India comes under direct British Crown rule.
Death of Swami Dayananda Saraswati’s mentor and establishment of Arya Samaj movement.
Formation of the Indian National Congress at Bombay.
Birth of Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru, India’s first Prime Minister.
Swami Vivekananda addresses the Parliament of the World's Religions in Chicago.
Death of Lokmanya Bal Gangadhar Tilak’s son; sparks public protests against British repression.
Partition of Bengal announced by Lord Curzon.
Beginning of the Swadeshi and Boycott Movement in Bengal.
Formation of the All India Muslim League at Dhaka.
Delhi declared as the new capital of India; Partition of Bengal annulled.
Ghadar Party formed in USA to overthrow British rule in India.
World War I begins after assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.
Lucknow Pact between INC and Muslim League.
Montagu Declaration promising gradual development of self-government in India.
Jallianwala Bagh massacre at Amritsar.
Khilafat Movement launched in support of Ottoman Caliphate.
Non-Cooperation Movement launched under Mahatma Gandhi.
Chauri Chaura incident leads to withdrawal of Non-Cooperation Movement.
Salt March begins from Sabarmati to Dandi.
First Round Table Conference held in London.
Gandhi-Irwin Pact signed; political prisoners released.
Bhagat Singh, Rajguru, and Sukhdev executed by British authorities.
Poona Pact signed between Mahatma Gandhi and B. R. Ambedkar.
World War II begins with German invasion of Poland.
Quit India Movement launched by Mahatma Gandhi.
Subhas Chandra Bose's INA captures Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
India gains independence from British rule; Partition creates Pakistan.
Mahatma Gandhi assassinated in New Delhi by Nathuram Godse.
Constitution of India comes into force; India becomes a Republic.
First Five-Year Plan launched focusing on agriculture.
First general elections held in independent India.
Panchsheel Agreement signed between India and China.
Launch of Sputnik 1 by USSR, beginning the space race.
Sino-Indian War fought over border disputes.
Second Indo-Pak War fought over Kashmir.
Indira Gandhi becomes the first woman Prime Minister of India.
Nationalization of 14 major Indian banks.
India defeats Pakistan in the Bangladesh Liberation War.
Emergency declared in India by Indira Gandhi.
India conducts first nuclear test at Pokhran (Smiling Buddha).
Operation Blue Star conducted at Golden Temple.
Assassination of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.
Economic liberalization reforms initiated by Manmohan Singh.
India conducts nuclear tests at Pokhran-II.
Kargil War between India and Pakistan begins.
Indian Parliament attacked by terrorists.
Indo-US Civil Nuclear Agreement signed.
Mumbai terrorist attacks carried out by Lashkar-e-Taiba.
India's Mars Orbiter Mission (Mangalyaan) successfully enters Mars orbit.
India launches its first indigenous space shuttle prototype (RLV-TD).
Narendra Modi sworn in for his second term as Prime Minister.
Article 370 abrogated; Jammu and Kashmir's special status removed.
India imposes nationwide COVID-19 lockdown.
India assumes G20 Presidency for 2023.
Chandrayaan-3 lands successfully on the Moon's south pole.
Ram Mandir inaugurated in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh.
